activity: Cycling Tour along the Dortmund-Ems Canal
description: Embark on a scenic cycling journey along the Dortmund-Ems Canal, perfect for groups to enjoy the natural beauty of Münster and its surroundings.

locationInfo.description: A beautiful cycling route along the Dortmund-Ems Canal, offering picturesque views of nature and peaceful surroundings.
safetyTips: Stay hydrated and take breaks when needed.

description: Gather your friends for a relaxing picnic by the beautiful Aasee, where you can enjoy a meal and soak up the sun.

locationInfo.description: A peaceful area next to the lake perfect for picnicking with your group, offering ample green space and stunning lake views.
safetyTips: Bring enough food and water for everyone.
Respect the public space and other visitors.

description: Rent a boat and take a leisurely tour around Aasee with your group, enjoying the serene atmosphere and scenic surroundings.

locationInfo.description: A boat rental service at Aasee that allows groups to explore the lake and enjoy the tranquility of the water.
safetyTips: Follow the rules for boat handling.
Stay together and avoid wandering too far from the group.

description: Take a group hike through the Coesfelder Wald, exploring the forest trails while enjoying the fresh air and the natural beauty of the woods.

locationInfo.description: A picturesque forest area just outside Münster, offering peaceful hiking trails that are perfect for group exploration.
safetyTips: Carry water and snacks to stay energized.
Stick together and stay on marked trails.

activity: Outdoor Volleyball at Stella Maris Beach
description: Enjoy a fun and competitive game of beach volleyball at Stella Maris Beach, perfect for large groups looking for an active day in the sun.

locationInfo.description: A sandy beach area near the lake offering volleyball courts and plenty of space for group sports activities.
safetyTips: Respect other players and follow the beach rules.
